alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 12:54PM EDT until April 01 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Erie County in northwestern Pennsylvania... Crawford County in northwestern Pennsylvania... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 1253 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from North Kingsville to 6 miles northeast of Middlefield, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. There have been numerous reports of tree and power-line damage and measured gusts in excess of 60 mph in Ohio with these storms. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Erie, Meadville, Conneaut, Corry, Edinboro, Titusville, North East, Union City, Girard, Cambridge Springs, Waterford, Albion, Linesville, Wattsburg, Adamsville, Pymatuning Central, Riceville, Harmonsburg, Guys Mills and Pymatuning North. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across Northeast Ohio. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
